hotels.title: Scotland Boutique Royal Troon Golf Club Retreat near the Ayrshire Coast
hotels.description: When you're searching for stellar coastal views, accommodation dripping in luxury and second-to-none golf facilities, look no further than Marine Troon, a newly renovated property with an unbeatable location along Scotland's stunning Ayrshire coast. Featuring just 89 rooms decorated in opulent style, paying homage to the rich history of the hotel, Marine Troon offers both sport-fuelled adventure and complete relaxation. The onsite restaurant serves up mouthwatering dishes from morning to night, while the state-of-the-art fitness centre, sauna, steam room and indoor swimming pool are perfect places to unwind after a long day. Keen golfers won't be able to resist a putt at the Royal Troon Golf Club, with an 18-hole course hugging the coastline, where matches have been hosted since 1878. The hotel boasts incredible views over the Royal Troon's 18th hole and the Isle of Arran, plus it's the ideal location to explore Dundonald Castle, Dean Castle Country Park and Burns Cottage. Or, opt to stay closer to home with Troon's handful of restaurants, sultry bars and pale sandy beach only a three-minute drive away.
